COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
 
We hereby declare that APCM - AssociaÃ§Ã£o Antipirataria de Cinema e Musica (Brazillian Anti Piracy Music and Cinema Association)- is the authorized representative of Universal Music do Brasil Ltda.; Warner Music Brasil Ltda.; SONY MUSIC Brasil Ltda.; SIGLA â€“ Sistema Globo de GravaÃ§Ãµes Audio Visuais Ltda; EMI Music Ltda.; Sony Pictures Home Entertainment do Brasil Ltda.; Disney Enterprises Inc.; Paramount Pictures Corporation; Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation.; Universal City Studios Inc.; Warner Bros., in this matter and can be reached at the address, phone, fax and email address listed above.
APCM is the Brazilian representant of IFPI - International Federation of the Phonographic Industry and MPA - Motion Picture Association.

WARNER MUSIC BRASIL LTDA, BMG BRASIL LTDA, SIGLA â€“ SISTEMA GLOBO DE GRAVAÃ‡Ã•ES AUDIO VISUAIS LTDA, EMI MUSIC LTDA, UNIVERSAL MUSIC LTDA, SONY MUSIC ENTERTAINMENT (BRASIL) IND.COM. LTDA WARNER BROS BRASIL LTDA, GLOBO VIDEO GRAVAÃ‡Ã•ES AUDIO VISUAIS LTDA, EMI MUSIC LTDA, UNIVERSAL PICTURES LTDA, SONY PICTURES ( BRASIL ) IND.COM. LTDA PARAMOUNT, BUENA VISTA and 20 CENTURY FOX are the owners or exclusive licensee of copyrights in the following works: sale, distribution, copy and foreclosure of the phonograms, video phonograms and movies, which they are the owners.

APCM believes in good faith that the items being offered for distribution by third parties on www.fileserve.com trough the files listed below infringe Copyright owner's interest in the copyrights related to one or more of the copyrighted works; (ALINE BARROS) such infringing items are being offered in a manner that is not authorized by our members or its agents, or the law.

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the www.fileserve.com files identified below:

http://www.fileserve.com/file/e5rsw5h

I declare under penalty of perjury that the above is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.
